message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM 

This paper deals with the problem of view synthesis from light fields, which is a topic related to computer vision (cs.CV) and computer graphics (cs.GR). The proposed method involves a convolutional neural network (CNN) and a learned gradient descent (LGD) framework, which are both techniques commonly used in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper also mentions the use of a small light field video dataset, which suggests a possible connection to multimedia (cs.MM).
